CustomField.description: The API name, including namespace, of the checkbox field on the Resource Request object that controls whether a resource request is excluded from forecasting calculations. If the checkbox field is selected on the record, the record is excluded.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name, including namespace, of the checkbox field on the Resource Request object that controls whether a resource request is excluded from forecasting calculations. If the checkbox field is selected on the record, the record is excluded.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Forecast RR Field
